definition[0]: someone who makes and repairs things made of iron
example[1]: a wordsmith  (=someone who works with words, for example a journalist)
definition[2]: a very common name in the UK and the US. There is a joke that it is used by people who do not want their real name to be known, especially in the past by people who were sharing a hotel room when they were not married
example[2]: They checked into the hotel as Mr and Mrs John Smith.
